metadata.dc:author: Ponsell Vicens, E
Navarro Ribera, J
Fornés Vives, J
metadata.dc:description: After a brief review of advanced radiographic diagnostic techniques, how to utilize them in the most cost-effective manner and minimize their risks, the authors examine the role of the nurse in using exploratory radiography in children. Patient opposition, immobilization and protection are some of the possible problems that one might encounter when working in this setting.
metadata.dc:title: Exploraciones radiológicas infantiles. Rol de Enfermería.
[Pediatric radiography. The nurses' role].
